00038 INT16 TerrainActionPoints( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridno, INT8 bDir, INT8 bLevel )
00039 {
00040             INT16 sAPCost = 0;
00041         INT16  sSwitchValue;
00042             BOOLEAN           fHiddenStructVisible;                     // Used for hidden struct visiblity
00043 
00044  if ( pSoldier->bStealthMode )
00045      sAPCost += AP_STEALTH_MODIFIER;
00046  
00047  if ( pSoldier->bReverse || gUIUseReverse )
00048      sAPCost += AP_REVERSE_MODIFIER;
00049 
00050  //if (GridCost[gridno] == NPCMINECOST)
00051  //   switchValue = BackupGridCost[gridno];
00052  //else
00053 
00054   sSwitchValue = gubWorldMovementCosts[sGridno][bDir][ bLevel ];
00055 
00056       // Check reality vs what the player knows....
00057       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00058       {
00059             // Is this obstcale a hidden tile that has not been revealed yet?
00060             if( DoesGridnoContainHiddenStruct( (UINT16)sGridno, &fHiddenStructVisible ) )
00061             {
00062                   // Are we not visible, if so use terrain costs!
00063                   if ( !fHiddenStructVisible )
00064                   {
00065                         // Set cost of terrain!
00066                         sSwitchValue = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubTerrainID ];                
00067                   }
00068             }
00069       }
00070       if ( sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING )
00071       {
00072             // use the cost of the terrain!
00073             sSwitchValue = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubTerrainID ];
00074       }
00075       else if (IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( sSwitchValue ))
00076       {
00077             sSwitchValue = DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sGridno, (UINT8) sSwitchValue, (BOOLEAN) (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum), NULL );
00078       }
00079 
00080       if (sSwitchValue >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED && sSwitchValue != TRAVELCOST_DOOR )
00081       {
00082          return(100);   // Cost too much to be considered!
00083       }
00084  
00085   switch( sSwitchValue )
00086   {
00087        case TRAVELCOST_DIRTROAD :
00088    case TRAVELCOST_FLAT             : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT; 
00089                                                                                           break;
00090     //case TRAVELCOST_BUMPY         :           
00091    case TRAVELCOST_GRASS            : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_GRASS;
00092                                                                                           break;
00093        case TRAVELCOST_THICK        :     sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_BUSH;
00094                                                                                           break;
00095    case TRAVELCOST_DEBRIS           : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_RUBBLE;
00096                                                                                           break;
00097    case TRAVELCOST_SHORE            : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_SHORE; // wading shallow water
00098                                                                                           break;
00099    case TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP   :     sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_LAKE; // wading waist/chest deep - very slow
00100                                                                                           break;
00101    
00102        case TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER: sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_OCEAN; // can swim, so it's faster than wading
00103                                                                                           break;
00104 /*
00105    case TRAVELCOST_VEINEND    :
00106    case TRAVELCOST_VEINMID    : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;
00107                                                                                           break;
00108 */
00109    case TRAVELCOST_DOOR             : sAPCost += AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;
00110                                                                                           break;
00111 
00112             // cost for jumping a fence REPLACES all other AP costs!
00113        case TRAVELCOST_FENCE        : return( AP_JUMPFENCE );
00114 
00115        case TRAVELCOST_NONE               : return( 0 );
00116 
00117    default:       
00118 
00119              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Calc AP: Unrecongnized MP type %d in %d, direction %d", sSwitchValue, sGridno, bDir ) );
00120                   break;
00121 
00122 
00123   }
00124 
00125       if (bDir & 1)
00126       {
00127             sAPCost = (sAPCost * 14) / 10;
00128       }
00129 
00130 
00131       return(sAPCost);
00132 
00133 }

00136 INT16 BreathPointAdjustmentForCarriedWeight( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00137 {
00138       UINT32      uiCarriedPercent;
00139       UINT32      uiPercentCost;
00140 
00141       uiCarriedPercent = CalculateCarriedWeight( pSoldier );
00142       if (uiCarriedPercent < 101)
00143       {
00144             // normal BP costs
00145             uiPercentCost = 100;
00146       }
00147       else
00148       {
00149             if (uiCarriedPercent < 151)
00150             {
00151                   // between 101 and 150% of max carried weight, extra BP cost
00152                   // of 1% per % above 100... so at 150%, we pay 150%
00153                   uiPercentCost = 100 + (uiCarriedPercent - 100) * 3;
00154             }
00155             else if (uiCarriedPercent < 201)
00156             {
00157                   // between 151 and 200% of max carried weight, extra BP cost
00158                   // of 2% per % above 150... so at 200%, we pay 250%
00159                   uiPercentCost = 100 + (uiCarriedPercent - 100) * 3 + (uiCarriedPercent - 150);
00160             }
00161             else
00162             {
00163                   // over 200%, extra BP cost of 3% per % above 200
00164                   uiPercentCost = 100 + (uiCarriedPercent - 100) * 3 + (uiCarriedPercent - 150) + (uiCarriedPercent - 200);
00165                   // so at 250% weight, we pay 400% breath!
00166             }
00167       }
00168       return( (INT16) uiPercentCost );
00169 }

00172 INT16 TerrainBreathPoints(SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sGridno,INT8 bDir, UINT16 usMovementMode)
00173 {
00174  INT32 iPoints=0;
00175  UINT8 ubMovementCost;
00176       
00177       ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[sGridno][bDir][0];
00178 
00179  switch( ubMovementCost )
00180  {
00181       case TRAVELCOST_DIRTROAD  :
00182       case TRAVELCOST_FLAT                : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;       break;
00183       //case TRAVELCOST_BUMPY             :     
00184   case TRAVELCOST_GRASS             : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_GRASS;      break;
00185   case TRAVELCOST_THICK             : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_BUSH;       break;
00186   case TRAVELCOST_DEBRIS            : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_RUBBLE;     break;
00187   case TRAVELCOST_SHORE             : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_SHORE;      break;      // wading shallow water
00188   case TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP    : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_LAKE;       break;      // wading waist/chest deep - very slow
00189   case TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER   : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_OCEAN;      break;      // can swim, so it's faster than wading
00190 //  case TRAVELCOST_VEINEND         :
00191 //  case TRAVELCOST_VEINMID         : iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;       break;
00192       default:
00193             if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
00194             {
00195                   iPoints = BP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;
00196                   break;
00197             }
00198 /*
00199 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00200      NumMessage("ERROR: TerrainBreathPoints: Unrecognized grid cost = ",
00201                                           GridCost[gridno]);
00202 #endif
00203 */
00204                   return(0);
00205   }
00206 
00207       iPoints = iPoints * BreathPointAdjustmentForCarriedWeight( pSoldier ) / 100;
00208 
00209   // ATE - MAKE MOVEMENT ALWAYS WALK IF IN WATER
00210       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubTerrainID == MED_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER )
00211   {
00212     usMovementMode = WALKING;
00213   }
00214 
00215       // so, then we must modify it for other movement styles and accumulate
00216       switch(usMovementMode)
00217       {
00218             case RUNNING:     
00219             case ADULTMONSTER_WALKING:    
00220             case BLOODCAT_RUN:
00221                   
00222                   iPoints *= BP_RUN_ENERGYCOSTFACTOR;       break;
00223 
00224             case SIDE_STEP:
00225             case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00226             case BLOODCAT_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00227             case MONSTER_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00228             case WALKING :    iPoints *= BP_WALK_ENERGYCOSTFACTOR;      break;
00229 
00230             case START_SWAT:
00231             case SWATTING:    
00232             case SWAT_BACKWARDS:
00233                   iPoints *= BP_SWAT_ENERGYCOSTFACTOR;      break;
00234             case CRAWLING:    iPoints *= BP_CRAWL_ENERGYCOSTFACTOR;     break;
00235 
00236 
00237       }
00238 
00239       // ATE: Adjust these by realtime movement
00240  if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00241  {
00242             // ATE: ADJUST FOR RT - MAKE BREATH GO A LITTLE FASTER!
00243             iPoints     = (INT32)( iPoints * TB_BREATH_DEDUCT_MODIFIER );
00244  }
00245 
00246 
00247       return( (INT16) iPoints);
00248 }

00251 INT16 ActionPointCost( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bDir, UINT16 usMovementMode )
00252 {
00253       INT16 sTileCost, sPoints, sSwitchValue;
00254 
00255       sPoints = 0;
00256 
00257       // get the tile cost for that tile based on WALKING
00258       sTileCost = TerrainActionPoints( pSoldier, sGridNo, bDir, pSoldier->bLevel );
00259 
00260       // Get switch value...
00261       sSwitchValue = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridNo ][ bDir ][ pSoldier->bLevel ];
00262 
00263   // Tile cost should not be reduced based on movement mode...
00264   if ( sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
00265   {
00266     return( sTileCost );
00267   }
00268 
00269   // ATE - MAKE MOVEMENT ALWAYS WALK IF IN WATER
00270       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubTerrainID == MED_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER )
00271   {
00272     usMovementMode = WALKING;
00273   }
00274 
00275       // so, then we must modify it for other movement styles and accumulate
00276       if (sTileCost > 0)
00277       {
00278             switch(usMovementMode)
00279             {
00280                   case RUNNING:     
00281                   case ADULTMONSTER_WALKING:    
00282                   case BLOODCAT_RUN:
00283                         sPoints = (INT16)(DOUBLE)( (sTileCost / RUNDIVISOR) );      break;
00284 
00285                   case CROW_FLY:
00286                   case SIDE_STEP:
00287                   case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00288                   case ROBOT_WALK:
00289                   case BLOODCAT_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00290                   case MONSTER_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00291       case LARVAE_WALK:
00292                   case WALKING :    sPoints = (sTileCost + WALKCOST);         break;
00293 
00294                   case START_SWAT:
00295                   case SWAT_BACKWARDS:
00296                   case SWATTING:    sPoints = (sTileCost + SWATCOST);         break;
00297                   case CRAWLING:    sPoints = (sTileCost + CRAWLCOST);        break;
00298 
00299                   default:
00300 
00301                         // Invalid movement mode
00302                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Invalid movement mode %d used in ActionPointCost", usMovementMode  ) );
00303                         sPoints = 1;
00304             }
00305       }
00306 
00307       if (sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING)
00308       {
00309             switch(usMovementMode)
00310             {
00311                   case RUNNING:     
00312                   case WALKING :
00313       case LARVAE_WALK:
00314                   case SIDE_STEP:
00315                   case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00316                         // charge crouch APs for ducking head!
00317                         sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
00318                         break;
00319 
00320                   default:                      
00321                         break;
00322             }
00323       }
00324 
00325       return( sPoints );
00326 }

00328 INT16 EstimateActionPointCost( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bDir, UINT16 usMovementMode, INT8 bPathIndex, INT8 bPathLength )
00329 {
00330       // This action point cost code includes the penalty for having to change
00331       // stance after jumping a fence IF our path continues...
00332       INT16 sTileCost, sPoints, sSwitchValue;
00333       sPoints = 0;
00334 
00335       // get the tile cost for that tile based on WALKING
00336       sTileCost = TerrainActionPoints( pSoldier, sGridNo, bDir, pSoldier->bLevel );
00337 
00338       // so, then we must modify it for other movement styles and accumulate
00339       if (sTileCost > 0)
00340       {
00341             switch(usMovementMode)
00342             {
00343                   case RUNNING:     
00344                   case ADULTMONSTER_WALKING:    
00345                   case BLOODCAT_RUN:
00346                         sPoints = (INT16)(DOUBLE)( (sTileCost / RUNDIVISOR) );      break;
00347 
00348                   case CROW_FLY:
00349                   case SIDE_STEP:
00350                   case ROBOT_WALK:
00351                   case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00352                   case BLOODCAT_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00353                   case MONSTER_WALK_BACKWARDS:
00354       case LARVAE_WALK:
00355                   case WALKING :    sPoints = (sTileCost + WALKCOST);         break;
00356 
00357                   case START_SWAT:
00358                   case SWAT_BACKWARDS:
00359                   case SWATTING:    sPoints = (sTileCost + SWATCOST);         break;
00360                   case CRAWLING:    sPoints = (sTileCost + CRAWLCOST);        break;
00361 
00362                   default:
00363 
00364                         // Invalid movement mode
00365                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Invalid movement mode %d used in ActionPointCost", usMovementMode  ) );
00366                         sPoints = 1;
00367             }
00368       }
00369 
00370       // Get switch value...
00371       sSwitchValue = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridNo ][ bDir ][ pSoldier->bLevel ];
00372 
00373       // ATE: If we have a 'special cost, like jump fence... 
00374       if ( sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
00375       {
00376             // If we are changeing stance ( either before or after getting there....
00377             // We need to reflect that...
00378             switch(usMovementMode)
00379             {
00380                   case SIDE_STEP:
00381                   case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00382                   case RUNNING:     
00383                   case WALKING :
00384 
00385                         // Add here cost to go from crouch to stand AFTER fence hop....
00386                         // Since it's AFTER.. make sure we will be moving after jump...
00387                         if ( ( bPathIndex + 2 ) < bPathLength )
00388                         {
00389                               sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
00390                         }
00391                         break;
00392 
00393                   case SWATTING:    
00394                   case START_SWAT:
00395                   case SWAT_BACKWARDS:
00396 
00397                         // Add cost to stand once there BEFORE....
00398                         sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
00399                         break;
00400 
00401                   case CRAWLING:    
00402 
00403                         // Can't do it here.....
00404                         break;
00405             }
00406       }
00407       else if (sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING)
00408       {
00409             switch(usMovementMode)
00410             {
00411                   case RUNNING:     
00412                   case WALKING :
00413                   case SIDE_STEP:
00414                   case WALK_BACKWARDS:
00415                         // charge crouch APs for ducking head!
00416                         sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
00417                         break;
00418 
00419                   default:                      
00420                         break;
00421             }
00422       }
00423 
00424       return( sPoints );
00425 }

00429 BOOLEAN EnoughPoints( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sAPCost, INT32 iBPCost, BOOLEAN fDisplayMsg )
00430 {
00431       INT16 sNewAP = 0;
00432 
00433       // If this guy is on a special move... don't care about APS, OR BPSs!
00434       if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo  )
00435       {
00436             return( TRUE );
00437       }
00438 
00439       if ( pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID >=QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_EAST && pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID <= QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_NORTH )
00440       {
00441             // AI guy on special move off map
00442             return( TRUE );
00443       }
00444 
00445       // IN realtime.. only care about BPs
00446       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00447       {
00448             sAPCost = 0;
00449       }
00450 
00451       #ifdef NETWORKED
00452       if( !IsTheSolderUnderMyControl( pSoldier->ubID)  )
00453       {
00454             return( TRUE );
00455       }
00456       #endif
00457 
00458       // Get New points
00459       sNewAP = pSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00460 
00461       // If we cannot deduct points, return FALSE
00462       if ( sNewAP < 0 )
00463       {
00464             // Display message if it's our own guy
00465             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && fDisplayMsg )
00466             {
00467                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NOT_ENOUGH_APS_STR ] );
00468             }
00469             return( FALSE );
00470       }
00471 
00472       return( TRUE );
00473 }

00475 
00476 void DeductPoints( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sAPCost, INT32 iBPCost,BOOLEAN fProactive )
00477 {
00478       INT16 sNewAP = 0, sNewBP = 0;
00479       INT8  bNewBreath;
00480 
00481 
00482       // in real time, there IS no AP cost, (only breath cost)
00483       if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00484       {
00485             sAPCost = 0;
00486       }
00487 
00488       // Get New points
00489       sNewAP = pSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00490 
00491       // If this is the first time with no action points, set UI flag
00492       if ( sNewAP <= 0 && pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0 )
00493       {
00494             pSoldier->fUIFirstTimeNOAP = TRUE;
00495             fInterfacePanelDirty = TRUE;
00496       }
00497 
00498       // If we cannot deduct points, return FALSE
00499       if ( sNewAP < 0 )
00500       {
00501             sNewAP = 0;
00502       }
00503 
00504       pSoldier->bActionPoints = (INT8)sNewAP;
00505 
00506       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Deduct Points (%d at %d) %d %d", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, sAPCost, iBPCost  ) );
00507 
00508   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
00509       {
00510             // zap all breath costs for robot
00511             iBPCost = 0;
00512       }
00513 
00514       // is there a BREATH deduction/transaction to be made?  (REMEMBER: could be a GAIN!)
00515       // NB: iBPCost > 0 - breath loss, iBPCost < 0 - breath gain
00516       if (iBPCost)
00517       {
00518             // Adjust breath changes due to spending or regaining of energy
00519             iBPCost = AdjustBreathPts(pSoldier, iBPCost);
00520 
00521             // Snap: award some health and strength for exertion
00522             // Do 4 StatChange rolls for health (2 for strength) per 10 breath points spent?
00523             // NB: The scale of iBPCost is 100 per breath point (BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL)
00524             if ( PTR_OURTEAM && iBPCost >= BP_MOVEMENT_GRASS && fProactive
00525                   && (INT32) PreRandom( 10 * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL ) < iBPCost )
00526             {
00527                   StatChange(pSoldier, HEALTHAMT, 4, FALSE);
00528                   StatChange(pSoldier, STRAMT, 2, FALSE);
00529             }
00530 
00531             // CJC: moved check for high breathred to below so that negative breath can be detected
00532 
00533             // Snap: kill the overflow bug already!
00534             // NB: normally, sBreathRed == (100 - bBreath)*BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL
00535             const INT16 BREATH_RED_MAX = 100 * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL;
00536             if ( pSoldier->sBreathRed + iBPCost < 0 )
00537             {
00538                   pSoldier->sBreathRed = 0;
00539             }
00540             else if ( pSoldier->sBreathRed + iBPCost > BREATH_RED_MAX )
00541             {
00542                   // Snap: moved this up, because it had no effect below
00543                   // Take off 1 AP per 5 (negative) breath...
00544                   pSoldier->bActionPoints -= ( pSoldier->sBreathRed + iBPCost - BREATH_RED_MAX )
00545                                                / ( 5 * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL );
00546                   if ( pSoldier->bActionPoints < 0 )
00547                   {
00548                         pSoldier->bActionPoints = 0;
00549                   }
00550 
00551                   pSoldier->sBreathRed = BREATH_RED_MAX;
00552             }
00553             else
00554             {
00555                   pSoldier->sBreathRed += iBPCost;
00556             }
00557 
00558             // Get new breath
00559             bNewBreath = ( pSoldier->bBreathMax * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL - pSoldier->sBreathRed )
00560                            / BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL;
00561 
00562             // Snap: This should never happen...
00563             if ( bNewBreath > pSoldier->bBreathMax )
00564             {
00565                   bNewBreath = pSoldier->bBreathMax;
00566             }
00567             else if ( bNewBreath < 0 )
00568             {
00569                   bNewBreath = 0;
00570             }
00571 
00572             pSoldier->bBreath = bNewBreath;
00573       }
00574 
00575       // UPDATE BAR
00576       DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL1 );
00577 
00578 }

00582 
00583 INT32 AdjustBreathPts(SOLDIERTYPE *pSold, INT32 iBPCost)
00584 {
00585  INT16 sBreathFactor = 100;
00586  UINT8 ubBandaged;
00587 
00588 
00589  //NumMessage("BEFORE adjustments, BREATH PTS = ",breathPts);
00590 
00591  // in real time, there IS no AP cost, (only breath cost)
00592  /*
00593  if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00594  {
00595        // ATE: ADJUST FOR RT - MAKE BREATH GO A LITTLE FASTER!
00596        iBPCost    *= TB_BREATH_DEDUCT_MODIFIER;
00597  }
00598  */
00599 
00600 
00601  // adjust breath factor for current breath deficiency
00602  sBreathFactor += (100 - pSold->bBreath);
00603 
00604  // adjust breath factor for current life deficiency (but add 1/2 bandaging)
00605  ubBandaged = pSold->bLifeMax - pSold->bLife - pSold->bBleeding;
00606  //sBreathFactor += (pSold->bLifeMax - (pSold->bLife + (ubBandaged / 2)));
00607  sBreathFactor += 100 * (pSold->bLifeMax - (pSold->bLife + (ubBandaged / 2))) / pSold->bLifeMax;
00608 
00609  if ( pSold->bStrength > 80 )
00610  {
00611        // give % reduction to breath costs for high strength mercs
00612        sBreathFactor -= (pSold->bStrength - 80) / 2;
00613  }
00614  
00615 /*    THIS IS OLD JAGGED ALLIANCE STUFF (left for possible future reference)
00616 
00617  // apply penalty due to high temperature, heat, and hot Metaviran sun
00618  // if INDOORS, in DEEP WATER, or possessing HEAT TOLERANCE trait
00619  if ((ptr->terrtype == FLOORTYPE) || (ptr->terr >= OCEAN21) ||
00620                                (ptr->trait == HEAT_TOLERANT))
00621    breathFactor += (Status.heatFactor / 5);     // 20% of normal heat penalty
00622  else
00623    breathFactor += Status.heatFactor;           // not used to this!
00624 */
00625 
00626 
00627  // if a non-swimmer type is thrashing around in deep water
00628       if ( (pSold->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) && (gMercProfiles[ pSold->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == NONSWIMMER) )
00629       {
00630             if ( pSold->usAnimState == DEEP_WATER_TRED || pSold->usAnimState == DEEP_WATER_SWIM)
00631             {
00632                   sBreathFactor *= 5;           // lose breath 5 times faster in deep water!
00633             }
00634       }
00635 
00636  if ( sBreathFactor == 0 )
00637  {
00638             iBPCost = 0;
00639  }
00640  else if (iBPCost > 0)        // breath DECREASE
00641    // increase breath COST by breathFactor
00642    iBPCost = ((iBPCost * sBreathFactor) / 100);
00643  else                   // breath INCREASE
00644    // decrease breath GAIN by breathFactor
00645    iBPCost = ((iBPCost * 100) / sBreathFactor);
00646 
00647  
00648  return(iBPCost);
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 
00653 void UnusedAPsToBreath(SOLDIERTYPE *pSold)
00654 {
00655       INT16 sUnusedAPs, sBreathPerAP = 0, sBreathChange, sRTBreathMod;
00656       BOOLEAN     fAnimTypeFound = FALSE;
00657 
00658       // Note to Andrew (or whomever else it may concern):
00659 
00660 
00661       // This function deals with BETWEEN TURN breath/energy gains. The basic concept is:
00662       //    
00663       //    - look at LAST (current) animation of merc to see what he's now doing
00664       //    - look at how many AP remain unspent (indicating duration of time doing that anim)
00665       //
00666       //  figure out how much breath/energy (if any) he should recover. Obviously if a merc
00667       //    is STANDING BREATHING and hasn't spent any AP then it means he *stood around* for
00668       //  the entire duration of one turn (which, instead of spending energy, REGAINS energy)
00669 
00670 
00671       // COMMENTED OUT FOR NOW SINCE MOST OF THE ANIMATION DEFINES DO NOT MATCH
00672 
00673       // If we are not in turn-based combat...
00674 
00675 
00676       if ( pSold->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00677       {
00678             return;
00679       }
00680 
00681       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00682       {
00683             // ALRIGHT, GIVE A FULL AMOUNT BACK, UNLES MODIFIED BY WHAT ACTIONS WE WERE DOING
00684             sBreathPerAP = GetBreathPerAP( pSold, pSold->usAnimState );
00685 
00686             // adjust for carried weight
00687             sBreathPerAP = sBreathPerAP * 100 / BreathPointAdjustmentForCarriedWeight( pSold );
00688 
00689             // If this value is -ve, we have a gain, else we have a loos which we should not really do
00690             // We just want to limit this to no gain if we were doing stuff...
00691             sBreathChange = 3 * sBreathPerAP;
00692             
00693             // Adjust for on drugs
00694             HandleBPEffectDueToDrugs( pSold, &sBreathChange );
00695 
00696             if ( sBreathChange > 0 )
00697             {
00698                   sBreathChange = 0;
00699             }
00700             else
00701             {
00702                   // We have a gain, now limit this depending on what we were doing...
00703                   // OK for RT, look at how many tiles we have moved, our last move anim
00704                   if ( pSold->ubTilesMovedPerRTBreathUpdate > 0 )
00705                   {
00706                         // How long have we done this for?
00707                         // And what anim were we doing?
00708                         sBreathPerAP = GetBreathPerAP( pSold, pSold->usLastMovementAnimPerRTBreathUpdate );
00709 
00710                         sRTBreathMod = sBreathPerAP * pSold->ubTilesMovedPerRTBreathUpdate;
00711             
00712                         // Deduct some if we were exerting ourselves
00713                         // We add here because to gain breath, sBreathChange needs to be -ve
00714                         if ( sRTBreathMod > 0 )
00715                         {
00716                               sBreathChange += sRTBreathMod;
00717                         }
00718 
00719                         if ( sBreathChange < 0 )
00720                         {
00721                               sBreathChange = 0;
00722                         }
00723                   }
00724             }
00725 
00726             // Divide by a number to adjust that in realtimer we do not want to recover as
00727             // as fast as the TB values do
00728             sBreathChange *= TB_BREATH_RECOVER_MODIFIER;
00729 
00730 
00731             // adjust breath only, don't touch action points!
00732             DeductPoints(pSold,0,(INT16)sBreathChange );
00733 
00734             // Reset value for RT breath update
00735             pSold->ubTilesMovedPerRTBreathUpdate = 0;
00736 
00737       }
00738       else
00739       {
00740             // if merc has any APs left unused this turn (that aren't carrying over)
00741             if (pSold->bActionPoints > MAX_AP_CARRIED)
00742             {
00743 
00744                   sUnusedAPs = pSold->bActionPoints - MAX_AP_CARRIED;
00745 
00746                   sBreathPerAP = GetBreathPerAP( pSold, pSold->usAnimState );
00747 
00748                   if (sBreathPerAP < 0)
00749                   {
00750                         // can't gain any breath when we've just been gassed, OR
00751                         // if standing in tear gas without a gas mask on
00752                         if ( pSold->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
00753                         {
00754                               return;           // can't breathe here, so get no breath back!
00755                         }
00756                   }
00757 
00758                   // adjust for carried weight
00759                   sBreathPerAP = sBreathPerAP * 100 / BreathPointAdjustmentForCarriedWeight( pSold );
00760             
00761                   sBreathChange = (AP_MAXIMUM - sUnusedAPs) * sBreathPerAP;
00762             }
00763             else
00764             {
00765                   sBreathChange = 0;
00766             }
00767             // Adjust for on drugs
00768             HandleBPEffectDueToDrugs( pSold, &sBreathChange );
00769 
00770             // adjust breath only, don't touch action points!
00771             DeductPoints(pSold,0,(INT16)sBreathChange );
00772 
00773       }
00774 }
00775 
00776 
00777 //rain
00778 extern INT8 gbCurrentRainIntensity;
00779 //end rain
00780 
00781 INT16 GetBreathPerAP( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState )
00782 {
00783       INT16 sBreathPerAP = 0;
00784       BOOLEAN     fAnimTypeFound = FALSE;
00785 
00786       if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_VARIABLE_EFFORT )
00787       {
00788             // Default effort
00789             sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_MIN_EFFORT;
00790 
00791             // OK, check if we are in water and are waling/standing
00792             if ( MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
00793             {
00794                   switch( usAnimState )
00795                   {
00796                         case STANDING:
00797 
00798                               sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_LT_EFFORT;
00799                               break;
00800 
00801                         case WALKING:
00802 
00803                               sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_MOD_EFFORT;
00804                               break;
00805                   }
00806             }
00807             else
00808             {
00809 
00810                   switch( usAnimState )
00811                   {
00812                         case STANDING:
00813 
00814                               sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_NO_EFFORT;
00815                               break;
00816 
00817                         case WALKING:
00818 
00819                               sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_LT_EFFORT;
00820                               break;
00821                   }
00822             }
00823             fAnimTypeFound = TRUE;
00824       }
00825 
00826       if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_NO_EFFORT )
00827       {
00828             sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_NO_EFFORT;
00829             fAnimTypeFound = TRUE;
00830       }
00831 
00832       if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MIN_EFFORT )
00833       {
00834             sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_MIN_EFFORT;
00835             fAnimTypeFound = TRUE;
00836       }
00837 
00838       if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_LIGHT_EFFORT )
00839       {
00840             sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_LT_EFFORT;
00841             fAnimTypeFound = TRUE;
00842       }
00843 
00844       if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MODERATE_EFFORT )
00845       {
00846             sBreathPerAP = BP_PER_AP_MOD_EFFORT;
00847             fAnimTypeFound = TRUE;
00848       }
00849 
00850       if ( !fAnimTypeFound )
00851       {
00852             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Unknown end-of-turn breath anim: %s", gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].zAnimStr ) );
00853       }
00854 
00855       //rain
00856       // Reduce breath gain on 25%/rain intensity
00857       if( sBreathPerAP < 0 && ( pSoldier->bLevel  ||!FindStructure( pSoldier->sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF )  )  && pSoldier->bBreath > 1)
00858       {
00859             sBreathPerAP -= (INT16)( sBreathPerAP * gbCurrentRainIntensity * gGameExternalOptions.ubBreathGainReductionPerRainIntensity  / 100 );     
00860       }
00861       //end rain
00862 
00863       return( sBreathPerAP );
00864 }
00865 
00866 //UINT8 CalcAPsToBurst( INT8 bBaseActionPoints, UINT16 usItem )
00867 UINT8 CalcAPsToBurst( INT8 bBaseActionPoints, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
00868 {
00869       INT32 aps;
00870 
00871   // base APs is what you'd get from CalcActionPoints();
00872       // NB round UP, so 21-25 APs pay full
00873       aps =  ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].bBurstAP * bBaseActionPoints + (AP_MAXIMUM - 1) ) / AP_MAXIMUM;
00874 
00875       /*if ( GetPercentBurstFireAPReduction(pObj)>0 )
00876       {
00877             aps = (aps * 100) / (100 + GetBurstFireAPReductionStatus(pObj) / (100/GetPercentBurstFireAPReduction(pObj)));
00878       }
00879 
00880       if ( GetPercentAPReduction(pObj)>0 )
00881       {
00882             aps = (aps * 100) / (100 + GetAPReductionStatus(pObj) / (100/GetPercentAPReduction(pObj)));
00883       }*/
00884       
00885       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToBurst: before bonus aps = %d, std bonus = %d, burst bonus = %d", aps,GetPercentAPReduction(pObj),GetPercentBurstFireAPReduction(pObj)));
00886       // Snap: do this a little differently: % reduction means
00887       // aps <- aps * ( 100 - red ) / 100
00888       aps = ( aps * ( 100 - GetPercentAPReduction(pObj) ) ) / 100;
00889       
00890       // Snap: moved this up to allow burst AP reduction up to 100%
00891       aps = __max( aps, ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].bBurstAP + 1 ) / 2 );
00892 
00893       aps = ( aps * ( 100 - GetPercentBurstFireAPReduction(pObj) ) ) / 100;
00894       
00895       if ( aps < 0 ) aps = 0;
00896       else if ( aps > AP_MAXIMUM ) aps = AP_MAXIMUM;
00897       
00898       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToBurst: return aps = %d", aps));
00899       return (UINT8) aps;
00900 }
00901 
00902 
00903 UINT8 CalcAPsToAutofire( INT8 bBaseActionPoints, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 bDoAutofire )
00904 {
00905 //    INT8 bAttachPos;
00906       INT32 aps=AP_MAXIMUM + 1;
00907       if ( GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs (pObj) )
00908       {
00909             // Snap: Do this just like in CalcAPsToBurst
00910 
00911             const INT32 autofireaps = 
00912             aps = ( ( 5 * bDoAutofire * bBaseActionPoints ) / GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(pObj) + (AP_MAXIMUM - 1) ) / AP_MAXIMUM;
00913 
00914             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutofire: base aps = %d, # shots = %d",aps,pSoldier->bDoAutofire ));
00915             //check for spring and bolt
00916             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), SPRING_AND_BOLT_UPGRADE );
00917             //if ( bAttachPos != -1 )
00918             //{   
00919             //    aps = (aps * 100) / (100 + pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] / 5);
00920             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutofire: found rod and spring, aps = %d, # shots = %d",aps,pSoldier->bDoAutofire ));
00921             //}
00922             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), REFLEX_SCOPED );
00923             //if ( bAttachPos != -1 )
00924             //{
00925             //    aps = (aps * 100) / (100 + pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] / 5);
00926             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutofire: found reflex scope, aps = %d, # shots = %d",aps,pSoldier->bDoAutofire ));
00927             //}
00928             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), REFLEX_UNSCOPED );
00929             //if ( bAttachPos != -1 )
00930             //{
00931             //    aps = ( aps * 100 ) / (100 + pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] / 5);
00932             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutofire: found reflex sight, aps = %d, # shots = %d",aps,pSoldier->bDoAutofire ));
00933             //}
00934             
00935             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutoFire: before bonus aps = %d, std bonus = %d, auto bonus = %d", aps,GetPercentAPReduction(pObj),GetPercentAutofireAPReduction(pObj)));
00936             aps = ( aps * ( 100 - GetPercentAPReduction(pObj) ) ) / 100;
00937             
00938             aps = __max( aps, ( autofireaps + 1 ) / 2 );
00939 
00940             // Snap: extend the burst bonus to autofire as well?
00941             aps = ( aps * ( 100 - GetPercentAutofireAPReduction(pObj) ) ) / 100;
00942             
00943             if ( aps < 0 ) aps = 0;
00944             else if ( aps > AP_MAXIMUM ) aps = AP_MAXIMUM;
00945       }
00946 
00947       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcAPsToAutoFire: return aps = %d", aps));
00948       return (UINT8) aps;
00949 }

00951 
00952 UINT8 CalcTotalAPsToAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost, INT8 bAimTime )
00953 {
00954       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
00955       UINT16                                    usItemNum;  
00956       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
00957       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
00958       INT16                                     sAdjustedGridNo;
00959       UINT32                                    uiItemClass;
00960       
00961       // LOOK IN BUDDY'S HAND TO DETERMINE WHAT TO DO HERE
00962       usItemNum = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
00963       uiItemClass = Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass;
00964 
00965       if ( uiItemClass == IC_GUN || uiItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER || uiItemClass == IC_TENTACLES || uiItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) 
00966       {
00967             sAPCost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubAddTurningCost );
00968 
00969             if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
00970             {
00971                   if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire && GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) > 0 )
00972                         sAPCost += CalcAPsToAutofire( CalcActionPoints( pSoldier ), &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), pSoldier->bDoAutofire );
00973                   else
00974                         sAPCost += CalcAPsToBurst( CalcActionPoints( pSoldier ), &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
00975             }
00976             else
00977             {
00978 
00979                   sAPCost += bAimTime;
00980             }
00981       }
00982 
00983       //ATE: HERE, need to calculate APs!
00984       if ( uiItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV )     
00985       {
00986              sAPCost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubAddTurningCost );
00987 
00988              //sAPCost = 5;
00989       }
00990 
00991       if ( uiItemClass == IC_PUNCH || ( uiItemClass == IC_BLADE && uiItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) )
00992       {
00993             // IF we are at this gridno, calc min APs but if not, calc cost to goto this lication
00994             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != sGridNo )
00995             {
00996                   // OK, in order to avoid path calculations here all the time... save and check if it's changed!
00997                   if ( pSoldier->sWalkToAttackGridNo == sGridNo )
00998                   {
00999                         sAdjustedGridNo = sGridNo;
01000                         sAPCost += (UINT8)( pSoldier->sWalkToAttackWalkToCost );
01001                   }
01002                   else
01003                   {
01004                         //INT32           cnt;
01005                         //INT16           sSpot;      
01006                         UINT8       ubGuyThere;
01007                         INT16       sGotLocation = NOWHERE;
01008                         BOOLEAN     fGotAdjacent = FALSE;
01009                         SOLDIERTYPE *pTarget;
01010 
01011                         ubGuyThere = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
01012 
01013                         if ( ubGuyThere != NOBODY )
01014                         {
01015 
01016                               pTarget = MercPtrs[ ubGuyThere ];
01017 
01018                               if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01019                               {
01020                                     sGotLocation = FindNextToAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
01021                                     if ( sGotLocation == -1 )
01022                                     {
01023                                           sGotLocation = NOWHERE;
01024                                     }
01025                               }
01026                               else
01027                               {
01028                                     sGotLocation = FindAdjacentPunchTarget( pSoldier, pTarget, &sAdjustedGridNo, &ubDirection );
01029                               }
01030                         }
01031 
01032                         if ( sGotLocation == NOWHERE && pSoldier->ubBodyType != BLOODCAT )
01033                         {
01034                               sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
01035 
01036                               if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
01037                               {
01038                                     sGotLocation = NOWHERE;
01039                               }
01040                               else
01041                               {
01042                                     sGotLocation = sActionGridNo;
01043                               }
01044                               fGotAdjacent = TRUE;
01045                         }
01046 
01047                         if ( sGotLocation != NOWHERE )
01048                         {
01049                               if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sGotLocation || !fGotAdjacent )
01050                               {
01051                                     pSoldier->sWalkToAttackWalkToCost = 0;
01052                               }
01053                               else
01054                               {
01055                                     // Save for next time...
01056                                     pSoldier->sWalkToAttackWalkToCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sGotLocation, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
01057 
01058                                     if (pSoldier->sWalkToAttackWalkToCost == 0)
01059                                     {
01060                                           return( 99 );
01061                                     }
01062                               }
01063                         }
01064                         else
01065                         {
01066                               return( 0 );
01067                         }
01068                         sAPCost += pSoldier->sWalkToAttackWalkToCost;
01069                   }
01070 
01071                   // Save old location!
01072                   pSoldier->sWalkToAttackGridNo = sGridNo;
01073 
01074                   // Add points to attack
01075                   sAPCost += MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sAdjustedGridNo, ubAddTurningCost );
01076             }
01077             else
01078             {
01079                   // Add points to attack
01080                   // Use our gridno
01081                   sAPCost += MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubAddTurningCost );
01082             }
01083 
01084             // Add aim time...
01085     sAPCost += bAimTime;
01086 
01087       }
01088 
01089       return( (INT8)sAPCost );
01090 }
01091 
01092 UINT8 MinAPsToAttack(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridno, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost)
01093 {
01094       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
01095       UINT32                                    uiItemClass;
01096 
01097       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01098       {
01099             INT16 glItem;
01100             // look for an attached grenade launcher
01101 
01102             glItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) );
01103             if ( glItem == NONE )
01104             {
01105                   // default to hand
01106                   // LOOK IN BUDDY'S HAND TO DETERMINE WHAT TO DO HERE
01107                   uiItemClass = Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass;
01108             }
01109             else
01110             {
01111                   uiItemClass = Item[ glItem ].usItemClass;
01112             }
01113       }
01114       else
01115       {
01116             // LOOK IN BUDDY'S HAND TO DETERMINE WHAT TO DO HERE
01117             uiItemClass = Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass;
01118       }
01119       
01120       if ( uiItemClass == IC_BLADE || uiItemClass == IC_GUN || uiItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER || uiItemClass == IC_TENTACLES || uiItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01121       {
01122             sAPCost = MinAPsToShootOrStab( pSoldier, sGridno, ubAddTurningCost );
01123       }
01124       else if ( uiItemClass & ( IC_GRENADE | IC_THROWN ) )
01125       {
01126             sAPCost = MinAPsToThrow( pSoldier, sGridno, ubAddTurningCost );
01127       }
01128       else if ( uiItemClass == IC_PUNCH )
01129       {
01130             sAPCost = MinAPsToPunch( pSoldier, sGridno, ubAddTurningCost );
01131       }
01132       
01133       return( (UINT8)sAPCost );
01134 }
01135 
01136 INT8 CalcAimSkill( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usWeapon )
01137 {
01138       INT8 bAimSkill;
01139 
01140       if ( Item[ usWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[ usWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
01141       {
01142             // GUNS: modify aiming cost by shooter's MARKSMANSHIP
01143             bAimSkill = EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier );
01144       }
01145       else
01146       // for now use this for all other weapons
01147       //if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE )     
01148       {
01149             // KNIVES: modify aiming cost by avg of attacker's DEXTERITY & AGILITY
01150             bAimSkill = ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + EffectiveAgility( pSoldier ) ) / 2;
01151             //return( 4 );
01152       }
01153       return( bAimSkill );
01154 }
01155 
01156 UINT8 BaseAPsToShootOrStab( INT8 bAPs, INT8 bAimSkill, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
01157 {
01158       INT32 Top, Bottom, rof;
01159 //    INT8  bAttachPos;
01160 
01161       // Calculate default top & bottom of the magic "aiming" formula!
01162 
01163       // get this man's maximum possible action points (ignoring carryovers)
01164       // the 2 times is here only to allow rounding off using integer math later
01165       //Top = 2 * bAPs;//CalcActionPoints( pSoldier );
01166 
01167       // Shots per turn rating is for max. aimSkill(100), drops down to 1/2 at = 0
01168       // DIVIDE BY 4 AT THE END HERE BECAUSE THE SHOTS PER TURN IS NOW QUADRUPLED!
01169       // NB need to define shots per turn for ALL Weapons then.
01170       rof = Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubShotsPer4Turns + GetRateOfFireBonus(pObj);
01171       
01172       //Bottom = ( ( 50 + (bAimSkill / 2) ) * rof ) / 4;
01173 
01174       // add minimum aiming time to the overall minimum AP_cost
01175       //     This here ROUNDS UP fractions of 0.5 or higher using integer math
01176       //     This works because 'top' is 2x what it really should be throughout
01177       //return( ( ( ( 100 * Top ) / Bottom ) + 1) / 2);
01178 
01179       // Snap: Refactored the formula to reduce the number of integer divisions
01180       Top = 8 * bAPs * ( 100 - GetPercentAPReduction(pObj) );
01181       Bottom = ( 100 + bAimSkill ) * rof;
01182       // (this will round to the nearest integer)
01183       return ( Top + Bottom / 2 ) / Bottom;
01184 }
01185 
01186 void GetAPChargeForShootOrStabWRTGunRaises( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost, BOOLEAN *pfChargeTurning, BOOLEAN *pfChargeRaise )
01187 {
01188        UINT8 ubDirection;
01189    UINT32   uiMercFlags;
01190    UINT16   usTargID;
01191    BOOLEAN  fAddingTurningCost = FALSE;
01192    BOOLEAN  fAddingRaiseGunCost = FALSE;
01193       
01194        if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01195        {
01196              // OK, get a direction and see if we need to turn...
01197              if (ubAddTurningCost)
01198              {
01199                    // Given a gridno here, check if we are on a guy - if so - get his gridno
01200                    if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usTargID, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO ) )
01201                    {
01202                               sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usTargID ]->sGridNo;
01203                    }
01204 
01205                    ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
01206 
01207                    // Is it the same as he's facing?
01208                    if ( ubDirection != pSoldier->bDirection )
01209                    {
01210                               fAddingTurningCost = TRUE;
01211                    }
01212              }
01213        }
01214        else
01215        {
01216              if (ubAddTurningCost)
01217              {
01218                         // Assume we need to add cost!
01219                         fAddingTurningCost = TRUE;
01220              }
01221        }
01222 
01223 
01224        if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01225        {
01226        }
01227        else
01228        {
01229              // Do we need to ready weapon?
01230              if ( !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags &( ANIM_FIREREADY | ANIM_FIRE ) ) )
01231              { 
01232                    fAddingRaiseGunCost = TRUE;
01233              }
01234        }
01235 
01236       (*pfChargeTurning) = fAddingTurningCost;
01237       (*pfChargeRaise )  = fAddingRaiseGunCost;
01238 }
01239 
01240 UINT8 MinAPsToShootOrStab(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost)
01241 {
01242       UINT32      uiMercFlags;
01243       UINT16      usTargID;
01244       INT8  bFullAPs;
01245       INT8 bAimSkill;
01246       UINT8 bAPCost = AP_MIN_AIM_ATTACK;
01247       BOOLEAN     fAddingTurningCost = FALSE;
01248       BOOLEAN     fAddingRaiseGunCost = FALSE;
01249       UINT16 usItem;
01250       UINT16 usRaiseGunCost = 0;
01251       UINT16 usTurningCost = 0;
01252 
01253 
01254       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01255       {
01256             usItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS] );//UNDER_GLAUNCHER;
01257       }
01258       else
01259       {
01260             usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
01261       }
01262 
01263 
01264       GetAPChargeForShootOrStabWRTGunRaises( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubAddTurningCost, &fAddingTurningCost, &fAddingRaiseGunCost );
01265 
01266 
01267       if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01268       {
01269              // Do we need to stand up?
01270              bAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
01271       }
01272 
01273       if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01274       {
01275             fAddingRaiseGunCost = FALSE;
01276       }
01277 
01278       //Calculate usTurningCost
01279       if ( fAddingTurningCost )
01280       {
01281             if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01282                   usTurningCost = 1;
01283             else
01284                   usTurningCost = GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
01285       }
01286 
01287       //Calculate usRaiseGunCost
01288       if (fAddingRaiseGunCost )
01289       {
01290             usRaiseGunCost = GetAPsToReadyWeapon( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
01291             pSoldier->fDontChargeReadyAPs = FALSE;
01292       }
01293 
01294 
01295       //charge the maximum of the 2
01296       bAPCost += __max(usTurningCost,usRaiseGunCost);
01297 
01298 
01299       if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01300       {
01301              // Given a gridno here, check if we are on a guy - if so - get his gridno
01302              if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usTargID, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO ) )
01303              {
01304                         sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usTargID ]->sGridNo;
01305              }
01306       }
01307 
01308       // if attacking a new target (or if the specific target is uncertain)
01309       if (( sGridNo != pSoldier->sLastTarget ) && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
01310       {
01311             bAPCost += AP_CHANGE_TARGET;
01312       }
01313 
01314       // Snap: reversed DIGICRAB's change.
01315       // bFullAPs are BASE APs, which do not include APs caried over from the previous turn.
01316       bFullAPs = CalcActionPoints( pSoldier );
01317 
01318       // aim skill is the same whether we are using 1 or 2 guns
01319       bAimSkill = CalcAimSkill( pSoldier, usItem );
01320 
01321       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01322       {
01323             INT16 glItem;
01324             OBJECTTYPE  GrenadeLauncher;
01325 
01326             // look for an attached grenade launcher
01327             glItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]));
01328             
01329             // create temporary grenade launcher and use that
01330             if ( glItem != NONE )
01331             {
01332                   CreateItem( glItem, GetGrenadeLauncherStatus(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]), &GrenadeLauncher );
01333             }
01334             else
01335             {
01336                   // fake it, use a 100 status...
01337                   CreateItem( UNDER_GLAUNCHER, 100, &GrenadeLauncher );
01338             }
01339 
01340         bAPCost += BaseAPsToShootOrStab( bFullAPs, bAimSkill, &GrenadeLauncher );
01341             
01342       }
01343       else if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
01344       {
01345         // charge the maximum of the two
01346         bAPCost += __max( 
01347                    BaseAPsToShootOrStab( bFullAPs, bAimSkill, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ),
01348                    BaseAPsToShootOrStab( bFullAPs, bAimSkill, &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]) ) );
01349       }
01350       else
01351       {
01352         bAPCost += BaseAPsToShootOrStab( bFullAPs, bAimSkill, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
01353       }
01354 
01355       // the minimum AP cost of ANY shot can NEVER be more than merc's maximum APs!
01356       if ( bAPCost > bFullAPs )
01357             bAPCost = bFullAPs;
01358 
01359       // this SHOULD be impossible, but nevertheless...
01360       if ( bAPCost < 1 )
01361             bAPCost = 1;
01362 
01363       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].rocketlauncher )
01364       {
01365             bAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );    
01366       }
01367 
01368 
01369       return ( bAPCost );
01370 }
01371 
01372 
01373 UINT8 MinAPsToPunch(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost)
01374 {
01375  UINT8      bAPCost = 0;
01376  UINT16 usTargID;
01377  UINT8      ubDirection;
01378 
01379  //  bAimSkill = ( pSoldier->bDexterity + pSoldier->bAgility) / 2;
01380  if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01381  {
01382        usTargID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
01383 
01384        // Given a gridno here, check if we are on a guy - if so - get his gridno
01385        if ( usTargID != NOBODY  )
01386        {
01387                   sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usTargID ]->sGridNo;
01388 
01389              // Check if target is prone, if so, calc cost...
01390              if ( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ usTargID ]->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01391              {
01392                    bAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
01393              }
01394              else
01395              {
01396        if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
01397        {
01398                       bAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
01399        }
01400              }
01401 
01402        }
01403 
01404        if (ubAddTurningCost)
01405        {
01406      if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
01407      {
01408        // ATE: Use standing turn cost....
01409                ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
01410 
01411                // Is it the same as he's facing?
01412                if ( ubDirection != pSoldier->bDirection )
01413                {
01414                           bAPCost += AP_LOOK_STANDING;
01415                }
01416      }
01417        }
01418 
01419  }
01420 
01421  bAPCost += 4;
01422 
01423  return ( bAPCost );
01424 }

01427 
01428 INT8 MinPtsToMove(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
01429 {
01430  // look around all 8 directions and return lowest terrain cost
01431  INT32      cnt;
01432  INT16      sLowest=127;
01433  INT16      sGridno,sCost;
01434 
01435  if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
01436  {
01437        return( (INT8)sLowest);
01438  }
01439 
01440  for (cnt=0; cnt <= 7; cnt++)
01441   {
01442     sGridno = NewGridNo(pSoldier->sGridNo,DirectionInc((INT16) cnt));
01443     if (sGridno != pSoldier->sGridNo)
01444             {
01445        if ( (sCost=ActionPointCost( pSoldier, sGridno, (UINT8)cnt , pSoldier->usUIMovementMode ) ) < sLowest )
01446                    {
01447                               sLowest = sCost;
01448                    }
01449             }
01450   }                                                   
01451   return( (INT8)sLowest);
01452 }
01453 
01454 INT8  PtsToMoveDirection(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection )
01455 {
01456       INT16 sGridno,sCost;
01457       INT8  bOverTerrainType;
01458       UINT16      usMoveModeToUse;
01459 
01460   sGridno = NewGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc((INT16) bDirection ) );
01461 
01462       usMoveModeToUse = pSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
01463 
01464       // ATE: Check if the new place is watter and we were tying to run....
01465       bOverTerrainType = GetTerrainType( sGridno );
01466 
01467       if ( bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER || bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER || bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER )
01468       {
01469             usMoveModeToUse = WALKING;
01470       }
01471 
01472   sCost = ActionPointCost( pSoldier, sGridno, bDirection , usMoveModeToUse );
01473 
01474   if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridno ][ bDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] != TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
01475   {
01476         if ( usMoveModeToUse == RUNNING && pSoldier->usAnimState != RUNNING )
01477         {
01478               sCost += AP_START_RUN_COST;
01479         }
01480   }
01481   
01482       return( (INT8)sCost );
01483 }
01484 
01485 INT8 MinAPsToStartMovement( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usMovementMode )
01486 {
01487       INT8  bAPs = 0;
01488 
01489       switch( usMovementMode )
01490       {
01491             case RUNNING:
01492             case WALKING:
01493                   if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE)
01494                   {
01495                         bAPs += AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE;
01496                   }
01497                   else if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH)
01498                   {
01499                         bAPs += AP_CROUCH;
01500                   }
01501                   break;
01502             case SWATTING:
01503                   if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE)
01504                   {
01505                         bAPs += AP_PRONE;
01506                   }
01507                   else if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND)
01508                   {
01509                         bAPs += AP_CROUCH;
01510                   }
01511                   break;
01512             case CRAWLING:
01513                   if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND)
01514                   {
01515                         bAPs += AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE;
01516                   }
01517                   else if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH)
01518                   {
01519                         bAPs += AP_CROUCH;
01520                   }
01521                   break;
01522             default:
01523                   break;
01524       }
01525 
01526       if (usMovementMode == RUNNING && pSoldier->usAnimState != RUNNING )
01527       {
01528             bAPs += AP_START_RUN_COST;
01529       }
01530       return( bAPs );
01531 }
01532 
01533 BOOLEAN EnoughAmmo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fDisplay, INT8 bInvPos )
01534 {
01535       if ( pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].usItem != NOTHING )
01536       {
01537             if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01538             {
01539                   UINT16 glItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[bInvPos]));
01540                   INT8 bAttachSlot = FindLaunchableAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[bInvPos]), glItem);
01541                   if ( bAttachSlot != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01542                   {
01543                         return TRUE;
01544                   }
01545                   else
01546                         return FALSE;
01547             }
01548             else
01549             {
01550                   if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].usItem].singleshotrocketlauncher  )
01551                   {
01552                         // hack... they turn empty afterwards anyways
01553                         return( TRUE );
01554                   }
01555 
01556                   if (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER || Item[pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].usItem].cannon )
01557                   {
01558                         if ( FindAttachmentByClass( &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]), IC_GRENADE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01559                         {
01560                               return( TRUE );
01561                         } 
01562 
01563                         // ATE: Did an else if here...
01564                         if ( FindAttachmentByClass( &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]), IC_BOMB ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01565                         {
01566                               return( TRUE );
01567                         } 
01568 
01569                         if ( fDisplay )
01570                         {
01571                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_OUT_OF_AMMO );
01572                         }
01573 
01574                         return( FALSE );
01575                   }
01576                   else if (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
01577                   {
01578                         if ( pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].ubGunShotsLeft == 0 )
01579                         {
01580                               if ( fDisplay )
01581                               {
01582                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_OUT_OF_AMMO );
01583                               }
01584                               return( FALSE );
01585                         }
01586 
01587                         //<SB> manual recharge
01588                         if( pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM )
01589                         {
01590                               if ( !(     pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ].ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER ) )
01591                               {
01592                                     return( FALSE );
01593                               }
01594                         }
01595                         //</SB>
01596                   }
01597             }
01598 
01599             return( TRUE );
01600       }
01601 
01602       return( FALSE );
01603 
01604 }
01605 
01606 
01607 void DeductAmmo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bInvPos )
01608 {
01609       OBJECTTYPE *            pObj;
01610 
01611       // tanks never run out of MG ammo!
01612       // unlimited cannon ammo is handled in AI
01613       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) && !Item[pSoldier->inv[bInvPos].usItem].cannon )
01614       {
01615             return;
01616       }
01617 
01618       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01619       if ( pObj->usItem != NOTHING )
01620       {
01621             if ( Item[pObj->usItem].cannon )
01622             {
01623             }
01624             else if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[pObj->usItem].cannon && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01625             {
01626                   if ( pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon == pObj->usItem)
01627                   {
01628                         // OK, let's see, don't overrun...
01629                         if ( pObj->ubGunShotsLeft != 0 )
01630                         {
01631                               pObj->ubGunShotsLeft--;
01632                               //Pulmu: Update weight after firing gun to account for bullets fired
01633                               if( gGameExternalOptions.fAmmoDynamicWeight == TRUE && pObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 0)
01634                               {
01635                                     pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]));
01636                               }
01637                         }
01638                   }
01639                   else
01640                   {
01641                         // firing an attachment?
01642                   }
01643             }
01644             else if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER || Item[pObj->usItem].cannon || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01645             {
01646                   INT8 bAttachPos;
01647 
01648                   bAttachPos = FindAttachmentByClass( pObj, IC_GRENADE );
01649                   if (bAttachPos == ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01650                   {
01651                         bAttachPos = FindAttachmentByClass( pObj, IC_BOMB );
01652                   }
01653                    
01654                   if (bAttachPos != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
01655                   {
01656                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DeductAmmo: deducting for GL: found attachment, about to decide whether to remove it"));
01657                         if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER && GetMagSize(pObj) > 1 )
01658                         {
01659                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DeductAmmo: deducting for milkor"));
01660                               pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] - (INT8) ceil((double)( 100 / GetMagSize(pObj) )) ;
01661 
01662                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DeductAmmo: deducting for milkor: resulting status: %d, remove? = %d",pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos],(pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] <= (INT8) ( 100 / Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize ))));
01663                               if ( pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] <= (INT8) ceil((double)( 100 / GetMagSize(pObj) ) ))
01664                               {
01665                                     RemoveAttachment( pObj, bAttachPos, NULL );
01666                               }
01667                         }
01668                         else if ( (pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO ) && Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize > 1 )
01669                         {
01670                               pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] - (INT8) ceil((double)( 100 / Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize )) ;
01671 
01672                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DeductAmmo: deducting for OICW GL: resulting status: %d, remove? = %d",pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos],(pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] <= (INT8) ( 100 / Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize ))));
01673                               if ( pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] <= (INT8) ceil((double)( 100 / Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize ) ))
01674                               {
01675                                     RemoveAttachment( pObj, bAttachPos, NULL );
01676                               }
01677                         }
01678                         else
01679                         {
01680                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DeductAmmo: deducting for GL: removing attachment"));
01681                               RemoveAttachment( pObj, bAttachPos, NULL );
01682                         }
01683                   }
01684             }
01685 
01686             // Dirty Bars
01687             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL1 );
01688 
01689       }
01690 }
01691 
01692 
01693 UINT16 GetAPsToPickupItem( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos )
01694 {
01695       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
01696       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
01697       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
01698 
01699       // Check if we are over an item pool
01700       if ( GetItemPool( usMapPos, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
01701       {
01702             // If we are in the same tile, just return pickup cost
01703             sActionGridNo = AdjustGridNoForItemPlacement( pSoldier, usMapPos );
01704 
01705             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
01706             {
01707                   sAPCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
01708             
01709                   // If point cost is zero, return 0
01710                   if ( sAPCost != 0 )
01711                   {
01712                         // ADD APS TO PICKUP
01713                         sAPCost += AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
01714                   }
01715             }
01716             else
01717             {
01718                         sAPCost += AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
01719             }
01720       }
01721 
01722       return( sAPCost );
01723 }
01724 
01725 
01726 UINT16 GetAPsToGiveItem( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos )
01727 {
01728       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
01729 
01730       sAPCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, usMapPos, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
01731 
01732       // If point cost is zero, return 0
01733       if ( sAPCost != 0 || pSoldier->sGridNo == usMapPos )
01734       {
01735             // ADD APS TO PICKUP
01736             sAPCost += AP_GIVE_ITEM;
01737       }
01738 
01739       return( sAPCost );

01742 
01743 INT8 GetAPsToReloadGunWithAmmo( OBJECTTYPE * pGun, OBJECTTYPE * pAmmo )
01744 {
01745       if (Item[ pGun->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
01746       {
01747             // always standard AP cost
01748             //return( AP_RELOAD_GUN );
01749             return GetAPsToReload(pGun);
01750       }
01751       if ( GetMagSize(pGun) == Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize )
01752       {
01753             // normal situation
01754 //          return( AP_RELOAD_GUN );
01755             return GetAPsToReload(pGun) ;
01756       }
01757       else
01758       {
01759             // trying to reload with wrong size of magazine
01760             return (GetAPsToReload(pGun) * 2);
01761 //          return( AP_RELOAD_GUN + AP_RELOAD_GUN );
01762       }
01763 }
01764 
01765 INT8 GetAPsToAutoReload( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01766 {
01767       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
01768       INT8                          bSlot, bSlot2, bExcludeSlot;
01769       INT8                          bAPCost = 0, bAPCost2 = 0;;
01770 
01771       CHECKF( pSoldier );
01772       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
01773 
01774 //<SB> manual recharge
01775       if (pObj->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
01776       {
01777             return Weapon[Item[(pObj)->usItem].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually;
01778       }
01779 //</SB>
01780 
01781       if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER) 
01782       {
01783             bSlot = FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, HANDPOS, NO_SLOT );
01784             if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
01785             {
01786                   // we would reload using this ammo!
01787                   bAPCost += GetAPsToReloadGunWithAmmo( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot] ) );
01788             }
01789 
01790             if ( IsValidSecondHandShotForReloadingPurposes( pSoldier ) )
01791             {
01792                   pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
01793                   bExcludeSlot = NO_SLOT;
01794                   bSlot2 = NO_SLOT;
01795 
01796                   // if the ammo for the first gun is the same we have to do special checks
01797                   if ( ValidAmmoType( pObj->usItem, pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].usItem ) )
01798                   {
01799                         if ( pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].ubNumberOfObjects == 1 )
01800                         {
01801                               // we must not consider this slot for reloading!
01802                               bExcludeSlot = bSlot;
01803                         }
01804                         else
01805                         {
01806                               // we can reload the 2nd gun from the same pocket!
01807                               bSlot2 = bSlot;
01808                         }
01809                   }
01810                   
01811                   if (bSlot2 == NO_SLOT)
01812                   {
01813                         bSlot2 = FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, SECONDHANDPOS, bExcludeSlot );
01814                   }
01815 
01816                   if (bSlot2 != NO_SLOT)
01817                   {
01818                         // we would reload using this ammo!
01819                         bAPCost2 = GetAPsToReloadGunWithAmmo( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot2] ) );
01820                         if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16) (bAPCost + bAPCost2), 0, FALSE ) )
01821                         {
01822                               // we can afford to reload both guns; otherwise display just for 1 gun
01823                               bAPCost += bAPCost2;
01824                         }
01825                   }
01826 
01827             }
01828 
01829       }
01830 
01831       return( bAPCost );
01832 }
01833 
01834 UINT16 GetAPsToReloadRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot )
01835 {
01836       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
01837   INT16             sActionGridNo;
01838   UINT8             ubDirection;
01839   INT16             sAdjustedGridNo;
01840 
01841       sActionGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, pRobot->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
01842 
01843       sAPCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
01844 
01845       // If point cost is zero, return 0
01846       if ( sAPCost != 0 || sActionGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo )
01847       {
01848             // ADD APS TO RELOAD
01849             sAPCost += 4;
01850       }
01851 
01852       return( sAPCost );
01853 }
