01857 
01858 UINT16 GetAPsToChangeStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDesiredHeight )
01859 {
01860       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
01861       INT8                                      bCurrentHeight;
01862 
01863       bCurrentHeight = gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
01864 
01865       if ( bCurrentHeight == bDesiredHeight )
01866       {
01867             sAPCost = 0;
01868       }
01869 
01870       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_STAND && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01871       {
01872             sAPCost = AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE;
01873       }
01874       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_STAND && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
01875       {
01876             sAPCost = AP_CROUCH;
01877       }
01878       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01879       {
01880             sAPCost = AP_PRONE;
01881       }
01882       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_STAND )
01883       {
01884             sAPCost = AP_CROUCH;
01885       }
01886       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_PRONE && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_STAND )
01887       {
01888             sAPCost = AP_PRONE + AP_CROUCH;
01889       }
01890       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_PRONE && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
01891       {
01892             sAPCost = AP_PRONE;
01893       }
01894 
01895       return( sAPCost );
01896 }
01897 
01898 UINT16 GetBPsToChangeStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDesiredHeight )
01899 {
01900       UINT16                                    sBPCost = 0;
01901       INT8                                      bCurrentHeight;
01902 
01903       bCurrentHeight = gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
01904 
01905       if ( bCurrentHeight == bDesiredHeight )
01906       {
01907             sBPCost = 0;
01908       }
01909 
01910       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_STAND && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01911       {
01912             sBPCost = BP_CROUCH + BP_PRONE;
01913       }
01914       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_STAND && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
01915       {
01916             sBPCost = BP_CROUCH;
01917       }
01918       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01919       {
01920             sBPCost = BP_PRONE;
01921       }
01922       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_STAND )
01923       {
01924             sBPCost = BP_CROUCH;
01925       }
01926       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_PRONE && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_STAND )
01927       {
01928             sBPCost = BP_PRONE + BP_CROUCH;
01929       }
01930       if ( bCurrentHeight == ANIM_PRONE && bDesiredHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
01931       {
01932             sBPCost = BP_PRONE;
01933       }
01934 
01935       return( sBPCost );
01936 }
01937 
01938 
01939 UINT16 GetAPsToLook( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01940 {
01941       // Set # of APs
01942       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
01943       {
01944             // Now change to appropriate animation
01945             case ANIM_STAND:
01946                   return( AP_LOOK_STANDING );
01947                   break;
01948 
01949             case ANIM_CROUCH:
01950                   return( AP_LOOK_CROUCHED );
01951                   break;
01952 
01953             case ANIM_PRONE:
01954                   // AP_PRONE is the AP cost to go to or from the prone stance.  To turn while prone, your merc has to get up to
01955                   // crouched, turn, and then go back down.  Hence you go up (AP_PRONE), turn (AP_LOOK_PRONE) and down (AP_PRONE).
01956                   return( AP_LOOK_PRONE + AP_PRONE + AP_PRONE );
01957                   break;
01958 
01959             // no other values should be possible
01960             default:
01961                   Assert( FALSE );
01962                   return(0);
01963                   break;
01964       }
01965 }

01968 BOOLEAN CheckForMercContMove( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01969 {
01970       INT16 sAPCost;
01971       INT16 sGridNo;
01972 
01973       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01974       {
01975             return( FALSE );
01976       }
01977 
01978       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01979       {
01980             return( FALSE );
01981       }
01982 
01983       if( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01984       {
01985             if( pSoldier->sGridNo != pSoldier->sFinalDestination || pSoldier->bGoodContPath  )
01986             {
01987                   // OK< check if we are the selected guy!
01988                   if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
01989                   {
01990                         if (SoldierOnScreen( pSoldier->ubID ) )
01991                         {
01992                               sGridNo = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
01993 
01994                               if ( pSoldier->bGoodContPath )
01995                               {
01996                                     sGridNo = pSoldier->sContPathLocation;
01997                               }
01998 
01999                               // Do a check if we can afford move here!
02000 
02001                               // get a path to dest...
02002                               if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 ) )
02003                               {
02004                                     sAPCost = PtsToMoveDirection( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] );
02005 
02006                                     if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 , FALSE ) )
02007                                     {
02008                                           return( TRUE );
02009                                     }     
02010                               }
02011                               else
02012                               {
02013                                     return( FALSE );
02014                               }
02015                         }
02016                   }
02017             }
02018       }
02019       return( FALSE );
02020 }

02023 INT16 GetAPsToReadyWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState )
02024 {
02025       UINT16 usItem;
02026 
02027       usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
02028 
02029       // If this is a dwel pistol anim
02030       // ATE: What was I thinking, hooking into animations like this....
02031       //if ( usAnimState == READY_DUAL_STAND || usAnimState == READY_DUAL_CROUCH )
02032       //{
02033             //return( AP_READY_DUAL );
02034       //}
02035       if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
02036       {
02037             //Madd: return the greater of the two weapons + 1:
02038             UINT8 rt1, rt2;
02039             rt1 = Weapon[usItem].ubReadyTime * ( 100 - GetPercentReadyTimeAPReduction(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) ) / 100;
02040             rt2 = Weapon[pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem].ubReadyTime * ( 100 - GetPercentReadyTimeAPReduction(&pSoldier->inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ]) ) / 100;
02041 
02042             return( max(rt1,rt2) + AP_READY_DUAL );
02043       }
02044 
02045 
02046       // OK, now check type of weapon
02047 
02048       if ( usItem == NOTHING )
02049       {
02050             return( 0 );
02051       }
02052       else
02053       {
02054             // CHECK FOR RIFLE
02055             if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
02056             {
02057                   return ( Weapon[ usItem ].ubReadyTime
02058                         * ( 100 - GetPercentReadyTimeAPReduction(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) ) ) / 100;
02059 
02060             }
02061       }
02062 
02063       return( 0 );
02064 }

02119 
02120 #define TOSSES_PER_10TURNS      18      // max # of grenades tossable in 10 turns
02121 #define AP_MIN_AIM_ATTACK       0       // minimum permitted extra aiming
02122 #define AP_MAX_AIM_ATTACK       4       // maximum permitted extra aiming
02123 
02124 
02125 INT16 MinAPsToThrow( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAddTurningCost )
02126 {
02127       INT32 iTop, iBottom;
02128       INT32 iFullAPs;
02129       INT32 iAPCost = AP_MIN_AIM_ATTACK;
02130       UINT16 usInHand;
02131   UINT16 usTargID;
02132   UINT32 uiMercFlags;
02133   UINT8 ubDirection;
02134 
02135       // make sure the guy's actually got a throwable item in his hand!
02136       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
02137 
02138   if ( ( !(Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE) ) )
02139       {
02140 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02141        ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_DEBUG, L"MinAPsToThrow - Called when in-hand item is %s", usInHand );
02142 #endif
02143        return(0);
02144       }
02145 
02146  if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02147  {
02148        // Given a gridno here, check if we are on a guy - if so - get his gridno
02149        if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usTargID, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO ) )
02150        {
02151                   sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usTargID ]->sGridNo;
02152        }
02153 
02154        // OK, get a direction and see if we need to turn...
02155        if (ubAddTurningCost)
02156        {
02157              ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
02158 
02159              // Is it the same as he's facing?
02160              if ( ubDirection != pSoldier->bDirection )
02161              {
02162                         //iAPCost += GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
02163              }
02164        }
02165  }
02166  else
02167  {
02168             // Assume we need to add cost!
02169             //iAPCost += GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
02170  }
02171 
02172  // if attacking a new target (or if the specific target is uncertain)
02173  if ( ( sGridNo != pSoldier->sLastTarget ) )
02174  {
02175    iAPCost += AP_CHANGE_TARGET;
02176  }
02177 
02178  iAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
02179 
02180 
02181       // Calculate default top & bottom of the magic "aiming" formula)
02182 
02183       // get this man's maximum possible action points (ignoring carryovers)
02184       iFullAPs = CalcActionPoints( pSoldier );
02185 
02186       // the 2 times is here only to around rounding off using integer math later
02187       iTop = 2 * iFullAPs;
02188 
02189       // if it's anything but a mortar
02190 //    if ( usInHand != MORTAR)
02191    // tosses per turn is for max dexterity, drops down to 1/2 at dexterity = 0
02192   // bottom = (TOSSES_PER_10TURNS * (50 + (ptr->dexterity / 2)) / 10);
02193  //else
02194    iBottom = ( TOSSES_PER_10TURNS * (50 + ( pSoldier->bDexterity / 2 ) ) / 10 );
02195 
02196 
02197  // add minimum aiming time to the overall minimum AP_cost
02198  //     This here ROUNDS UP fractions of 0.5 or higher using integer math
02199  //     This works because 'top' is 2x what it really should be throughout
02200       iAPCost += ( ( ( 100 * iTop ) / iBottom) + 1) / 2;
02201 
02202 
02203  // the minimum AP cost of ANY throw can NEVER be more than merc has APs!
02204  if ( iAPCost > iFullAPs )
02205    iAPCost = iFullAPs;
02206 
02207  // this SHOULD be impossible, but nevertheless...
02208  if ( iAPCost < 1 )
02209    iAPCost = 1;
02210 
02211 
02212  return ( (INT16)iAPCost );
02213 }

02225

02227       {
02228             sAPs += AP_DROP_BOMB;
